casebody.data:
No. 1141,

Misc.

Harris v. United States. Paul H. Weinstein for petitioner. Solicitor General Marshall, Assistant Attorney General Vinson, Beatrice Rosenberg and Julia P. Cooper for the United States.

C. A. D. C. Cir. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and certiorari granted.. Case transferred to appellate docket.
